pros: Experience unparalleled luxury and off-road capability with the latest Land Cruiser ZX. This 2022 model is in pristine condition, imported directly from Japan, and features a full host of modern amenities. Ready for immediate delivery.
column21: Unmatched long-term reliability and resale value.|Ultimate combination of luxury and true off-road power.|Brand new 3.3L V6 diesel is both powerful and efficient.
column22: Large size can be difficult to manage in tight city streets.|Premium vehicle with corresponding high-end running costs.

pros: A true modern classic. This Defender 110, imported from the UK, combines rugged durability with a premium, tech-forward interior. Full service history available. A rare find in Sri Lanka.
column21: Iconic, head-turning design.|Extremely capable off-roader with modern air suspension.|Tech-filled and luxurious interior.
column22: Long-term reliability is not as proven as its Japanese rivals.|Parts and servicing are at a premium price point.

description: The legendary 'Godzilla'. This Nismo-tuned GT-R is a track weapon, sourced directly from Japan. Available via our 'On-Demand' import service. Contact us for a full consultation.
pros: Mind-bending acceleration and supercar performance.|Infinitely tunable and massive aftermarket support.|A true JDM legend.
cons: Very stiff ride, not ideal for a comfortable daily driver.|High-performance vehicle with very high maintenance costs.
